source_description: Build canonical mission-audit lifecycle event contracts and conformance fixtures for post-merge audit in Spec Kitty 2.x. Event family prefix MissionAudit*, five events (Requested, Started, DecisionRequested, Completed, Failed), payloads with mission/run/feature ids verdict severity artifact refs provenance pointers, deterministic replay fixtures for pass/warning/fail/decision-required, compatible with MissionDossier contracts, 2.x only.
